column1: '''''The 1986 Tolkien Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Unwin Hyman
column2: Unwin Paperbacks]] in [[1985]]. It features art by [[Michael Hague]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]''.
